title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting project P2 and attempting to close it, the option to open/close the project is not always available.
EB: When selecting project P2 and attempting to close it, the option to open/close the project should always be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select project P2. 
3. Attempt to close project P2 and verify if the option to open/close the project is available.
